title: IMI
instructions: A number of statements which people have used to describe the game are given below. Read each statement and indicate how you thought during the game. Find the word or pharase that best describes how you thought and select it. There are no right or wrong answers. Do not spend too much time on any one statement. REmember, give the answer which seems to describe how you thought during the game.

q_text.text: I enjoyed this game very much
I think I am pretty good at this game
I put a lot of effort into this game
It was important to me to do well at this game
I tried very hard while playing this game
I would describe this game as very interesting
I am satisfied with my performance at this game
I was anxious while playing the game
I didn't try very hard at playing
While playing, I was thinking about how much I enjoyed it
After playing the game for a while, I felt pretty competent
I was very relaxed while playing
I am pretty skilled at this game
This game did not hold my attention
I couldn't play this game very well
